meanings.sent1: The pectinate edges of the leaf helped in identifying the plant.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a pectinate pattern on its body.
meanings.sent3: The pectinate design on the cake made it look like a smiling face.
meanings.sent4: The pectinate outline of the mountain range resembled a dragon's spine.
meanings.sent5: The pectinate border of the puzzle piece made it easy to connect.

meanings.definition: Arranged like the teeth of a comb
meanings.sent1: The pectinate rows of seats in the auditorium allowed for clear visibility.
meanings.sent2: The pectinate pattern of the fence added a decorative touch to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pectinate layout of the books on the shelf made them easy to find.
meanings.sent4: The pectinate arrangement of the trees along the path created a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent5: The pectinate formation of the clouds resembled a fluffy blanket in the sky.
